title: Management by objectives : performance and potential review
brief_description: SUMMARY: Introduced by John Humble, the film shows the second stage of management by objectives within a company. Having established individual responsibilities and improvement requirements previously, performance is reviewed three months later. The film also covers reviewing of individual potential from results obtained during the previous process. Intended for use with study material
